name: mrcepid-mergecollapsevariants
title: MergeCollapseVariants
summary: Generates merged dummy input files for various association testing software

inputSpec.name: input_vcf_list
inputSpec.label: list of input TARBALL files that have been processed with mrcepid-collapsevariants
inputSpec.help: A list file (NOT a file:array) that has one line per file you would like to merge together

inputSpec.name: file_prefix
inputSpec.label: name to append to beginning of output files.
inputSpec.help: A prefix describing the variant type. MUST be the same as the prefix used for input_vcf_list and when running mrcepid-collapsevariants

outputSpec.name: output_tarball
outputSpec.label: Output tarball of all files for association testing
outputSpec.help: Single merged output .tar.gz file for running mrcepid-runassocationtesting
